item.description:
Want a chance to be on TV... or at least just have something fun to do on Saturday?  Well, there's a new TV show coming out called "The Hero" and they are having open auditions on Saturday October 20, 2012 at Jillian's on Lansdowne St. 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM.

So what's the deal?  Here is what they have to say

"We are currently looking nationwide for everyday people who are ready to prove themselves in a physical and mental adventure of a lifetime!  "The Hero" is a reality competition series looking for the ultimate competitor who is ready and willing to push themselves to the limits!  We are not necessarily casting the fittest or the fastest, just anyone who is willing to challenge themselves in a big way for HUNDREDS of thousands of dollars!  We are casting Nationwide and will be holding open calls in: Los Angeles, Boston, Dallas, Chicago, New York and Nashville.  Boston open call is on Saturday October 20th at JILLIAN'S (3 Lansdowne Street Boston, MA 02215) from 10am-4pm."

For full details and to apply for auditions, please follow this link: http://www.theherotnt.com/home

Who knows... you might get famous!  If nothing else, it'll be something fun to talk about when asked what you did over the weekend!
item.how_to_find_us: This is just to notify you of open auditions - we'll be there, but might be hard to find each other.
item.name: Auditions for new TV show - THE HERO - at Jillian's
